name: acquisition-source
description: Get the website acquisition source and medium and store in a cookie.

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production webpack && npm run build:min && npm run build:doc
scripts.cov: npm run cov:clean && npm run cov:generate
scripts.cov:generate: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --report text --report html test/acquisition-source.js
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run build && npm test
scripts.validate-dev: npm run lint && npm run build && npm test | faucet
scripts.deps: npm run deps:missing && npm run deps:extra
scripts.check: npm run audit && npm run deps && npm outdated --depth 0
